citations.desc: Access and inspection of records and property; submission of itineraries.
citations.narrative:
On May 24, 2023, at approximately 11:11 am, I went to this facility to complete a routine inspection. However, the
licensee's son, who has been primarily overseeing the business, met me at the gate (an older teenage boy accompanied
him) and stated he did not want to have an inspection conducted today. I made him aware that I would have to cite him for
not being able to complete the inspection, and would have to return some other time, to which he responded, "That's fine."
At this time he turned and walked away and I left the premises.
This inspection and exit interview were conducted with a facility representative.
n

narrative:
2.126(a) 
   
Access and inspection of records and property; submission of itineraries. 
On May 24, 2023, at approximately 11:11 am, I went to this facility to complete a routine inspection. However, the 
licensee's son, who has been primarily overseeing the business, met me at the gate (an older teenage boy accompanied 
him) and stated he did not want to have an inspection conducted today. I made him aware that I would have to cite him for 
not being able to complete the inspection, and would have to return some other time, to which he responded, "That's fine." 
At this time he turned and walked away and I left the premises. 
 
This inspection and exit interview were conducted with a facility representative. 
 
 n
